00041 {
00042     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043         void PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting7Edit::setOptions(void)
00044     {
00045         mParent->getOptions()->VertexCompression = false;
00046         mParent->getOptions()->lodMorph = false;        
00047     }
00048     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     PagingLandScapeTexture* PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting7Edit::newTexture()
00050     {
00051         return new PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting7Edit(mParent);
00052     }
00053     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00054     bool PagingLandScapeTexture_Splatting7Edit::isMaterialSupported()
00055     {                   
00056                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00057                 
00058                 if (opt->NumMatHeightSplat < 2)
00059                         return false;
00060         if (opt->numTextureUnits < 8)
00061             return false;
00062             
00063         return true;
00064     }

00069     }
